creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Local authority organized the place where residents of Toretsk can warm up, get hot drinks, food, charge their gadgets and connect to the Starlink internet. Toretsk is a small coal mine town near the frontline in Donetsk region. Since 2014, people here has been living with the war next door, as the nearest city of Horlivka was occuped by Russians. There are approximately 17 thousands people living in Toretsk and nearest villages now.
